publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-987 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Rule 2.3.1-That the Parliament agrees the following dates under Rule 2.3.1: 5 July - 3 September 2004 (inclusive), 11 - 22 October 2004 (inclusive), 27 December 2004 - 7 January 2005 (inclusive). Supported by: Tavish Scott*
